bonsai_class module

Created on Sat Dec 31 01:22:28 2022

Author: Viktor Pfaffenrot

This class creates a bonsai with an id, a name and action attributes namely when to next fertilize, when was the last pruning, the last repotting and the last wiring.

class bonsai_class.bonsai(treeid: int = 1, name: str = 'bonsai', next_fertilize: str = 'Not Yet', last_pruning: str = 'Not Yet', last_repot: str = 'Not Yet', last_wiring: str = 'Not Yet', info: str = '')

Bases: object

Setters of the action attributes

set_next_fertilize(next_fertilize: str)
set_last_pruning(last_pruning: str)
set_last_repot(last_repot: str)
set_last_wiring(last_wiring: str)

Remaining:

all = []

keeps track of all the created instances

initiate_database()

This method initializes the bonsai database if not already existent. Calls bonsai_database.initialize_table()

classmethod load_database(db_file: str)

Loads the bonsai database. Calls bonsai_database.load_database()

Returns:

List of bonsai objects.

set_info(db_file: str)
update_database(db_file: str, add: bool)

Updates the bonsai database. Calls bonsai_database.add_record() or bonsai_database.remove_record() depending on add flag
